specific_question: Which of our content marketing channels (blog, social media, email) generates the most leads in Q1 of 2025?
answer: Our blog content generates 40% of our leads, with an average conversion rate of 5%.
justification: Identifying effective content marketing channels helps us optimize our strategy to attract digital-first patients.
dr_question: What are the most critical elements of a robust digital presence for a telehealth provider such as MediConn Solutions, and how can we optimize our website and content marketing strategy to attract digital-first patients?
